## SeisFluid.connect() method

Connect to the Fluid protocol and create an `SeisFluid` object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static connect(signerOrProvider: SeisSigner | SeisProvider, optionalParams?: SeisFluidConnectionOptionalParams): Promise<SeisFluid>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  signerOrProvider | [SeisSigner](./lib-ethers.etherssigner.md) \| [SeisProvider](./lib-ethers.ethersprovider.md) | Seis <code>Signer</code> or <code>Provider</code> to use for connecting to the Seieum network. |
|  optionalParams | [SeisFluidConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnectionoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters that can be used to customize the connection. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SeisFluid](./lib-ethers.ethersfluid.md)<!-- -->&gt;
